body: Why this additional include? It isn't related to the removal of libevent compatibility code. If because of `std::runtime_error` use below, should be a separate commit.

Agree with @kristapsk  the include-change thoughâit can't be related to the preprocessor logic change, would make sense to split to a separate commit.

> would make sense to split to a separate commit.

I've just dropped it for now.
